import React from "react" import Back from "../common/back/Back" import "./contact.css" const Contact = () => { const map = 'https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m14!1m8!1m3!1d1903.138105927823!2d78.444411!3d17.446489!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x3bcb90e76b6662c5%3A0x9ad96c95b077cb8e!2sSanjeeva%20Reddy%20Nagar%2C%20Hyderabad%2C%20Telangana%20500038!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sin!4v1683267179117!5m2!1sen!2sin" width="600" height="450" style="border:0;" allowfullscreen="" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade ' return ( <>

Contact us

We're open for any suggestion or just to have a chat

ADDRESS:

HYDERABAD | BANGALORE | TIRUPATI | GUNTUR

EMAIL:

contact@aavanto.com

PHONE:

+91-8639005305

Follow us here

FACEBOOK TWITTER INSTAGRAM DRIBBBLE
) } export default Contact
